issue.title: [C++] Support zstandard<1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4761](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4761). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To support building with as many system packages as possible on Ubuntu, we should support building with zstandard 0.5.1 which is the one available on Ubuntu Xenial. Given the size of our current code for Zstandard, this seems feasible.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4761?focusedCommentId=16932339) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Due to our maintenance workload, I'm not sure we still care about this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4761?focusedCommentId=17070681) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We can install Zstandard 1.3.1 from xenial-updates on Ubuntu 16.04: https://packages.ubuntu.com/xenial-updates/libzstd1-dev
